alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 11:42AM EST until December 22 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Thu 10 am: 11.1 Forecast: Thu 1 pm 11.2 Thu 7 pm 11.2 Fri 1 am 11.1 Fri 7 am 10.3 Fri 1 pm 10.3 Fri 7 pm 10.3 Sat 1 am 8.3 Sat 7 am 8.3 Sat 1 pm 8.4 Sat 7 pm 8.4 Sun 1 am 7.5 Sun 7 am 7.5 &&
